titleStmt.title: Saint Peters chaine consisting of eight golden linckes, most fit to adorne the neckes of the greatest states, nobles, and ladies in this land, as the chiefest iewell of true nobilitie: and not vnfit for the meaner sort. Digested into eight chapters, and published by R.M. minister. With a praier annexed to the end of euerie chapter.
titleStmt.author: Mavericke, Radford, b. 1560 or 61.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet, dwelling at Paules Wharfe at the signe of the Crosse Keyes, and are there to be solde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
